translation.en: [narrator] On the Motherworld, one thousand kings ruled unchallenged in succession.
translation.es: En el Mundo Madre, mil reyes reinaron en sucesión incontestada.

translation.en: But in the royal bloodline's lust for power,
translation.es: Sin embargo, las ansias de poder del linaje real

translation.en: they consumed everything upon their planet.
translation.es: los llevaron a consumirlo todo en su planeta.

translation.en: The Realm marched its armies into the vastness of space,
translation.es: Los ejércitos del Reino marcharon a la vastedad del espacio

translation.en: conquering everything in its path.
translation.es: y conquistaron todo a su paso.

translation.en: The glory of the Motherworld seemed without end
translation.es: La gloria del Mundo Madre parecía no tener fin,

translation.en: until the treachery of an assassin's blade struck down the King and Queen,
translation.es: hasta que una traicionera espada asesina ultimó al rey y a la reina

translation.en: severing the royal bloodline forever.
translation.es: y acabó para siempre con el linaje real.

translation.en: In the chaotic aftermath of the King's death,
translation.es: En medio del caos tras la muerte del soberano,

translation.en: several conquered planets on the edge of the Motherworld's reach
translation.es: varios planetas conquistados en los extremos del Mundo Madre

translation.en: began to whisper of revolution.
translation.es: comenzaron a susurrar ideas de revolución.

translation.en: A senator named Balisarius used the opportunity to seize power,
translation.es: Un senador llamado Balisarius aprovechó la oportunidad para tomar el poder

translation.en: declaring himself regent.
As a show of strength, he sent his most brutal commander
translation.es: Como muestra de poderío, envió a su comandante más cruel

translation.en: into the outer reaches of the Motherworld's dominion
translation.es: a los confines del dominio del Mundo Madre

translation.en: to find and crush without mercy
translation.es: con la misión de aplastar sin piedad

translation.en: those who would call themselves rebel.
[man] Kora. Kora!
I thought you were finished.
Everyone's up in the Longhouse.
translation.es: Todos están en la casa comunal.

translation.en: -These are my last rows and I'll be done. -All right.
translation.es: - Me quedan estos últimos surcos. - Bien.

translation.en: Okay.
Den was asking where you were.
He and his brother got a big snow-elk, male.
translation.es: Él y su hermano cazaron un gran alce de nieve macho.

translation.en: He wanted you to see it before he dressed it.
translation.es: Quiere que lo veas antes de abrirlo.

translation.en: Why was he asking for me?
Well, you know, because he's…
I, I just thought… I just thought…
You thought?
-Move up. -[uraki groans]
It's been a while since we've had fresh meat. Forgot how good it is.
translation.es: Hace mucho no teníamos carne fresca. Había olvidado lo rica que es.

translation.en: [man] Den said they saw the summer herds returning.
translation.es: Según Den, vieron volver las manadas del verano.

translation.en: Maybe three days' ride away.
translation.es: Quizá a tres días de cabalgata.

translation.en: -He was asking for you. -[Kora] I heard.
And, yes, it's quite impressive.
Which one? The animal?
Or…
Or the hunter?
[villager] Hey!
My people,
it is my duty as the head of this community
translation.es: es mi deber como jefe de esta comunidad

translation.en: to remind you that the gods of the harvest demand a tribute.
translation.es: recordarles que los dioses de la cosecha exigen un tributo.

translation.en: [villager] Yeah.
[leader] An offering.
But we all know it is the thrusting of hips…
translation.es: Pero todos sabemos que son el meneo de caderas

translation.en: …and the loud sounds of pleasure that summon the seedlings to sprout.
translation.es: y los fuertes gemidos de placer los que impulsan la germinación.

translation.en: -[villagers laugh] Yeah! -[chuckles]
So make love tonight.
translation.es: Así que hagan el amor esta noche.

translation.en: For the harvest. For the very food we eat.
translation.es: Por la cosecha. Por la comida que nos llevamos a la boca.

translation.en: -Yeah! -[villagers] Yeah!
For the gods!
Let's have some music.
Some music to get us in the mood.
Den is a good man.
You should be asleep.
He's the best hunter among us.
And a loyal friend.
Have you thought of a more permanent relationship?
translation.es: ¿No pensaste en una relación más permanente?

translation.en: I know that he's amenable to the idea.
He's asked me himself.
It's easy between us.
Does it have to be more than that?
It's just, uh…
That would be your last step to becoming a full member of this community.
translation.es: Sería el último paso para integrarte totalmente a la comunidad.

translation.en: I'm telling you, this is home now.
I want that to be true.
You know,
the two seasons I've spent here have given me happiness
translation.es: Las dos estaciones que pasé aquí me dieron una felicidad

translation.en: that I don't deserve.
But understand, I am a child of war.
translation.es: Pero, comprende, soy hija de la guerra.

translation.en: To truly love and be loved, I…
translation.es: Amar y ser amada de verdad es…

translation.en: I don't know if I'm capable of either.
The very idea of love, of… family was beaten out of me.
translation.es: Me quitaron a los golpes el concepto de amor, de familia.

translation.en: I was taught that love is weakness.
translation.es: Me enseñaron que el amor es debilidad.

translation.en: And I…
I don't know how that will ever change.
translation.es: No sé si eso cambiará algún día.

translation.en: You should get some rest.
Yeah.
[woman] I noticed you left early last night.
translation.es: Noté que anoche te fuiste temprano.

translation.en: Were you tired?
[Kora] That's right. I thought I'd make it an early night.
translation.es: Así es. Tenía ganas de ir a dormir.

translation.en: I thought you were doing your part for the harvest.
translation.es: Creí que hacías tu parte por la cosecha.

translation.en: Because as I walked home, I passed Den's house.
translation.es: Cuando iba a mi casa, pasé por la de Den,

translation.en: -That's what it sounded like. -[Kora laughs]
translation.es: y eso fue lo que oí, sin duda.

translation.en: Sam, I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.es: Sam, no sé de qué hablas.

translation.en: [Sam] I think you do.
What do you think they want?
Everything.
I don't care what the potential upside might be,
translation.es: No importa cuál sea el beneficio potencial.

translation.en: a warship hanging over our land cannot be good.
translation.es: Una nave de guerra sobre nosotros no es bueno.

translation.en: That's your problem. Your first reaction is always fear.
translation.es: Ese es tu problema. Tu primera reacción siempre es miedo.

translation.en: The Motherworld has deep pockets.
translation.es: El Mundo Madre es muy rico.

translation.en: I'm simply saying maybe we can get a better price
translation.es: Solo digo que quizá consigamos mejor precio

translation.en: from our friends in low orbit there,
translation.es: con los amigos en órbita baja

translation.en: rather than having to deal with the cutthroats in Providence,
translation.es: que negociando con los rufianes de Providence

translation.en: selling our grain to God only knows.
translation.es: y vendiéndole a Dios sabe quién.

translation.en: Don't act like we don't know you've been selling our surplus grain
translation.es: Todos sabemos que vendiste el excedente

translation.en: to the enemies of that ship up there.
translation.es: a los enemigos de esa nave.

translation.en: I wonder what they would say if they found out where our excess went last year.
translation.es: A ver qué dicen si descubren adónde fue el excedente el año pasado.

translation.en: Well, I'm no revolutionary.
They offered the best price. I don't care about their cause.
translation.es: Pagaban el mejor precio. Me da igual su causa.

translation.en: Obviously.
Sindri, I don't have a side, only this community.
translation.es: Sindri, mi único interés es esta comunidad.

translation.en: That's my only loyalty.
And I say we start by showing them goodwill, not fear.
translation.es: Y propongo comenzar por mostrar buena voluntad, no miedo.

translation.en: That we are their partners, not their adversaries, right?
translation.es: Mostrémosles que somos sus socios, no sus adversarios.

translation.en: Did you say "partner," Gunnar?
I did. Is that a problem?
That ship does not represent prosperity.
Its purpose is to destroy, to subjugate, to enslave.
translation.es: Su propósito es destruir, subyugar, esclavizar.

translation.en: -Partnership is not in its vocabulary. -[villagers gasp]
translation.es: Eso no figura en su vocabulario.

translation.en: Give them what they ask for.
But volunteer nothing about how fertile this land is.
translation.es: Pero no revelen cuán fértil es la tierra.

translation.en: And hope they leave before digging too deep into who Gunnar sold last year's grain to.
translation.es: Ojalá se vayan sin descubrir a quiénes vendió Gunnar el año pasado.

translation.en: -Right. -I've heard enough. We volunteer nothing.
translation.es: - Bien. - Suficiente. No les ofreceremos nada.

translation.en: Is that clear?
[villager] They're here!
They're coming! They're coming! They're coming!
Hello. I am Sindri, father of this village.
translation.es: Hola. Soy Sindri, padre de esta aldea.

translation.en: Welcome.
I'm Admiral Atticus Noble.
translation.es: Yo soy el almirante Atticus Noble.

translation.en: Loyal representative of the slain King.
I welcome you to his warm embrace.
Please, father, tell me about this beautiful village.
translation.es: Por favor, padre, cuénteme de esta bella aldea.

translation.en: Walk with me up to our Longhouse.
We can have a cup of ale and I will tell you about life here.
translation.es: Beberemos una cerveza y le hablaré sobre la vida aquí.

translation.en: Oh. Sounds perfect. Lead the way.
[Sindri] We've carved out a simple life here.
And we take pride in the love of our community,
translation.es: Nos enorgullecemos del amor de esta comunidad

translation.en: and the hard work it takes to survive here.
translation.es: y de cuánto trabajamos para sobrevivir.

translation.en: [Noble] Your people seem healthy and well-fed.
translation.es: Su gente luce sana, bien alimentada.

translation.en: As their leader, much of that prosperity must be credited to you.
translation.es: Como su líder, debe ser artífice de tal prosperidad.

translation.en: No, we are a community. The credit is no one person's.
translation.es: No, somos una comunidad. No hay un solo artífice.

translation.en: Oh, I know that in the best of times, the credit's shared,
translation.es: En los tiempos buenos, todos lo son,

translation.en: but when the stores are empty, you know where the responsibility falls.
translation.es: pero cuando las reservas se acaban, hay un único responsable.

translation.en: The weight of the leader, I suppose.
So you… you understand the feeling of, like, a father,
translation.es: Así que, como padre, usted comprende

translation.en: the need to feed your children, yes?
translation.es: la necesidad de alimentar a sus hijos.

translation.en: I was hoping that your land and the people of Veldt might help
translation.es: Esperaba que el pueblo de Veldt nos ayudara a dar

translation.en: as we search for a small band of revolutionaries hiding in this system.
translation.es: con una pandilla de revolucionarios oculta en el sistema.

translation.en: Who my commander, the Regent Balisarius, bid me find and bring to justice.
translation.es: Mi comandante, el regente Balisarius, me ordenó llevarla a la justicia.

translation.en: We are humble farmers,
far removed from the politics of the Motherworld.
translation.es: muy ajenos a la política del Mundo Madre.

translation.en: -[ax clatters] -And still you can serve. Hmm.
The rebels we seek have been attacking our supply ports.
translation.es: Los rebeldes han atacado nuestros puertos de provisiones.

translation.en: Led by a woman named Devra Bloodaxe, and her brother Darrian.
translation.es: Sus líderes son Devra Bloodaxe y su hermano Darrian.

translation.en: Their capture's inevitable.
However, it's taken longer than anticipated,
translation.es: Sin embargo, ha llevado más tiempo del previsto,

translation.en: and we found ourselves admittedly low on stores.
translation.es: y nos encontramos escasos de granos.

translation.en: And as you know or may have heard, an army runs on its stomach.
translation.es: Y como sabrá o habrá oído decir, "a barriga llena, corazón contento".

translation.en: I was thinking of a partnership, where you supply us with food.
translation.es: Le propongo una colaboración. Ustedes nos proveen de alimentos.

translation.en: Whatever you have to spare, of course.
In exchange, you're compensated at…
Let's call it triple the market value, shall we?
With that windfall, you'll be able to buy plenty of harvesters, robots,
translation.es: Con ese ingreso inesperado, pagarán cosechadores, robots,

translation.en: and won't have to do this difficult work by hand.
translation.es: y evitarán hacer a mano tan ardua tarea.

translation.en: We believe that doing the work by hand connects us to the land
translation.es: Nosotros creemos que el trabajo manual nos conecta con la tierra

translation.en: and honors these sacred fields that give us life.
translation.es: y honra estos campos sagrados que nos dan vida.

translation.en: [Noble] There's peace of mind knowing that you're invaluable
translation.es: Da tranquilidad saber que uno tiene un rol invaluable

translation.en: in the important mission of rooting out enemies of the Motherworld.
translation.es: en la vital misión de exterminar a los enemigos del Mundo Madre.

translation.en: -[Sindri] It's quite a proposal. -[Noble] Yes.
[Sindri] If only we had some surplus to offer.
You see, the land is rocky
and yields barely enough to feed ourselves.
translation.es: y dan apenas suficiente para alimentarnos nosotros.

translation.en: So, it is with sincere apologies that we must decline the offer.
translation.es: Mis sinceras disculpas, pero debemos decir que no.

translation.en: However, we are grateful
translation.es: No obstante, agradecemos la presencia de un poder

translation.en: for the presence of such a benevolent and powerful protector.
translation.es: No obstante, agradecemos la presencia de un poder tan benevolente y poderoso.

translation.en: No surplus?
-None at all? -[chuckles]
But your land looks so fertile.
Your fields seem larger than what your population might need.
translation.es: Parece alcanzar de sobra para su población.

translation.en: Of course, I understand how it might seem.
Yet the scale of the planting is evidence of the poor soil.
translation.es: Sin embargo, la escala de la plantación es prueba de la pobreza del suelo.

translation.en: And our harsh winters only add to the short season.
translation.es: Los duros inviernos dejan una estación muy breve.

translation.en: Now, what do you say we share that cup of ale, eh?
Sorry.
It's just…
I mean, look at these beautiful people.
I can't imagine these glowing complexions are nourished by a barren field.
translation.es: Esos rostros rozagantes no pueden alimentarse de campos áridos.

translation.en: Now… who's the man or woman among you who oversees the harvest?
translation.es: ¿Quién es el hombre o la mujer que supervisa la cosecha?

translation.en: There must be one whose thumb is greener than the rest.
translation.es: Alguien tendrá más mano con las plantas.

translation.en: Someone?
[Gunnar] Yes, sir.
-[Noble] Ah. -That is me.
[Noble] Good.
Yes, I oversee the harvest.
Well, if these people trust you, then so do I.
translation.es: Si esta gente confía en ti, yo también.

translation.en: Trying to understand how I could be so wrong about what this land could yield.
translation.es: Deseo entender en qué me equivoco con esta tierra.

translation.en: That's all.
Well, sir.
Sindri, our beloved father, is always looking out for the welfare of our village
translation.es: Sindri, nuestro amado padre, siempre vela por el bienestar de la aldea

translation.en: and so insists on keeping reserves in case of famine or drought,
translation.es: e insiste en tener reservas en caso de hambruna o sequía,

translation.en: which, as you know, is the responsibility of a leader.
translation.es: como bien corresponde a un líder.

translation.en: [splutters] But we have been lucky these last few seasons.
translation.es: Pero estas últimas estaciones, hemos sido afortunados.

translation.en: Our surplus has been more than we can store.
translation.es: No damos abasto con el excedente.

translation.en: So, there might be
a chance that we can spare a small amount.
translation.es: sea posible prescindir de una pequeña parte.

translation.en: Depending, of course, on the scale of your needs.
translation.es: Según la escala de sus necesidades.

translation.en: Mmm. Good. Good.
Yeah, I mean, it's always wise to hold some in reserve, isn't it, father?
translation.es: Sí, siempre es sabio tener cierta reserva, ¿verdad, padre?

translation.en: Yep. Yep.
I am confused though.
Curious why you should have me believe this land could barely yield enough to feed your people.
translation.es: Me intriga por qué dijo que apenas tenía suficiente para su gente.

translation.en: -Seems that wasn't entirely true. -[Gunnar] No, wait, wait.
translation.es: - Al parecer, no era cierto. - No, espere.

translation.en: Admiral, no one is trying to mislead you.
Sindri simply has a slightly more conservative view on reserves than I do.
translation.es: Sindri tiene una visión más conservadora que yo en cuanto a las reservas.

translation.en: But we're both excited about a possible partnership.
translation.es: Pero a ambos nos entusiasma una posible sociedad.

translation.en: Just bear in mind the reality of what we can supply.
translation.es: Siempre y cuando considere nuestras posibilidades.

translation.en: Father, who is this exactly?
-Uh… My… -[Sindri] He's of no consequence.
I have been empowered by my people to speak for them.
translation.es: Mi pueblo me encomendó ser su portavoz.

translation.en: This man has no authority here.
You would be wise to ignore him.
[Noble] Well… a rift.
It's not quite the idyllic community I'd first seen.
translation.es: No es la comunidad idílica que vi al principio.

translation.en: Father, if I may
offer you some advice when dealing with subordinates who need to be kept in place.
translation.es: le ofrezco un consejo al tratar con subordinados que requieren disciplina.

translation.en: I find people can lose sight of the stakes and sometimes need a gentle reminder
translation.es: A veces la gente pierde de vista lo que está en juego y necesita recordar

translation.en: of just how those with power deal with those without.
translation.es: cómo tratan los poderosos a quienes no tienen poder.

translation.en: [Sindri] Admiral.
Please.
-No, I… I would never… -It's fine.
-[nervously] I… -Let me show you what I mean.
translation.es: Yo… Le mostraré a qué me refiero.

translation.en: [Sindri] Please.
Admiral.
[Gunnar] No, stop!
[villager] No!
[Gunnar] What did you do?
When can I expect my harvest?
I don't…
I said, tell me, partner, when I can expect my harvest.
translation.es: Le pregunté, socio, cuándo estará mi cosecha.

translation.en: -Nine… nine weeks. -Very well.
In ten weeks, I shall return.
You shall have my 10,000 bushels prepared for my ship.
translation.es: Tendrá 10 000 almudes listos para mi nave.

translation.en: Twelve… We barely produce 12,000 bushels.
We'll starve to death.
I don't understand what you want.
Well, it's simple.
I want everything.
All right, listen up.
I need all of this gear moved to this big stone building.
translation.es: Estos equipos van a esa gran casa de piedra.

translation.en: That should suit us for now.
Marcus, you're gonna help me evict the current residents from our new home.
translation.es: Marcus, me ayudarás a desalojar a los residentes actuales.

translation.en: Copy?
Copy you, boss.
Copy you.
Hello, everyone.
I am JC-1435 of the Mechanicas Militarium, defender of the King.
translation.es: Soy JC-1435 de Militares Mecánicos, defensor del rey.

translation.en: Correction, of the slain King.
It is my honor to serve.
translation.es: Es un honor para mí servir.

translation.en: I'm Private Aris.
We're moving supplies to that building, if you wouldn't mind lending a hand.
translation.es: Llevamos provisiones a esa casa, y podrías darnos una mano.

translation.en: Thank you, Private Aris.
That falls perfectly into my protocols.
translation.es: Eso se ajusta perfectamente a mis protocolos.

translation.en: [Marcus] I'm talking to you, you dirty drain turtle. Come here.
translation.es: Te hablo a ti, viejo mugriento. Ven aquí.

translation.en: [shouts] The hell you waiting for? Get out, man!
Thank you.
Now, what in the name of the old gods are you looking at?
I'm sorry, I was just waiting to see if you needed some more water.
translation.es: Lo siento, esperaba ver si necesitaban más agua.

translation.en: Some more water?
That's how I like 'em. Young, strong enough to put up a fight.
translation.es: Así me gustan. Jóvenes, con fuerzas para resistirse.

translation.en: -Boss. -[commander] Hmm?
Look, they left us a Jimmy.
It's a Jimmy, man.
I didn't know we had any of those left.
translation.es: No sabía que nos quedaba alguno.

translation.en: All right, careful. The ground's uneven till you get to the bridge.
translation.es: Cuidado. El suelo es inestable hasta llegar al puente.

translation.en: Thank you, Private Aris, but I believe I can manage.
translation.es: Gracias, cabo Aris, pero creo que no tendré problema.

translation.en: [Marcus] They won't fight anymore.
What do you mean they won't fight anymore?
It's something in their programming.
Once the King was killed,
they just laid down their weapons and refused to fight.
translation.es: depusieron las armas y se negaron a luchar.

translation.en: Just watch, no matter what I do, he doesn't fight back.
translation.es: Observe. No importa lo que haga, no se defiende.

translation.en: [Marcus] Hey!
Careful with that stuff, you stupid machine.
I'll turn you into scrap, you dumbshit. You hear me?
You're not hearing me.
[Aris] Hey! Stop.
What if I shoot you instead, huh?
translation.es: ¿Y si mejor te disparo a ti?

translation.en: I could kill you right now and no one would care.
translation.es: Podría matarte aquí mismo. A nadie le importaría.

translation.en: -Would they? -[commander] That's enough.
What do you say? Wanna die?
What's it, huh?
Come on, boy.
I said, enough.
Get these crates into that house now, Private.
translation.es: Lleve estas cajas a esa casa ya mismo, cabo.

translation.en: Yes, boss.
Are you malfunctioning?
No, sir.
Get up. Go to the river. Clean yourself.
translation.es: Levántate. Ve al río a limpiarte.

translation.en: The rest of you, stop staring.
Get back to work.
[Marcus] Get back to work, assholes.
[commander] That includes you, Marcus.
[soldier 1] You got it?
[Sam] Excuse me.
[JC-1435] Thank you. That is kind.
-You're a soldier? -Long ago.
Do you mind? I'm Sam.
[JC-1435] Please.
Tell me, Sam. Do you know the story of our slain King
translation.es: Dime, Sam. ¿Conoces la historia de nuestro rey caído

translation.en: and his beautiful daughter, the Princess Issa?
translation.es: y su bella hija, la princesa Issa?

translation.en: I don't.
Well, you remind me of her.
In myth, she was called the Chalice or the Redeemer.
translation.es: Según el mito, ella era el Cáliz o la Redentora.

translation.en: She was pueri salvatoris.
And even before she was born,
I and my brothers pledged everything we were,
translation.es: con mis hermanos juramos dar todo de nosotros,

translation.en: everything that dwells inside this metal skin,
translation.es: todo lo que habita bajo esta piel de metal,

translation.en: to fight in her name.
So when word reached us on some distant battlefield
translation.es: Por eso, al enterarme en un distante campo de batalla

translation.en: that she, as prophesied, had been born of flesh and blood into our world,
translation.es: de que ella había llegado en carne y hueso a nuestro mundo, según la profecía,

translation.en: I felt a great warmth for the universe
and trusted that she was to usher in a new age of peace and compassion.
translation.es: y confié en que ella augurara una nueva era de paz y compasión.

translation.en: And bring us home.
translation.es: Y que nos llevara a casa.

translation.en: She was magic.
[JC-1435] Ah, yes. She was more than magic.
On the day of her coronation,
she, along with our honored King and Queen,
translation.es: ella y los honorables rey y reina

translation.en: were assassinated in cold blood by those they trusted most.
translation.es: fueron asesinados a sangre fría por aquellos en quienes más confiaban.

translation.en: I fear we lost some measure of our honor since that betrayal.
translation.es: Temo que, desde aquella traición, hemos perdido parte de nuestro honor.

translation.en: I'm afraid our compassion, our kindness,
translation.es: Creo que nuestra compasión, nuestra bondad,

translation.en: our very joy,
died with that young girl.
I think it lives in you.
translation.es: Yo creo que viven dentro de ti.

translation.en: This is your fault, Gunnar!
I didn't know that he would kill them.
Doesn't matter. He's dead now.
[villager 1] What about the soldiers? Next, it's gonna be the other house.
translation.es: ¿Qué hacemos con los soldados? Seguirán con la otra casa.

translation.en: -[villager 2] I don't know. -Stop, please.
How about we bring in the crop and we fall on their mercy?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si entregamos la cosecha y rogamos piedad?

translation.en: [villager 3] Yeah.
We make ourselves invaluable. They wouldn't be able to kill us.
translation.es: - Sí. - Hagámonos imprescindibles. No podrán matarnos. Nos necesitarán.

translation.en: -They would need us. -He's right.
translation.es: No podrán matarnos. Nos necesitarán. - Sí. - Tiene razón.

translation.en: Farming, that is our skill that we can do, that they cannot.
translation.es: Sabemos de labranza, y ellos no.

translation.en: If we show them how good we are, they will be forced to spare us.
translation.es: Si ven lo buenos que somos, deberán perdonarnos la vida.

translation.en: -Yes. -Yes. Yeah.
-Do we agree? Our work fights for us. -[all] Yes!
translation.es: - ¿Sí? Nos protege nuestra labor. - ¡Sí! - Sí. - Sí.

translation.en: -Our work fights for us. Yes? -[villagers] Yes!
[Den] It's settled then.
-We show them how valuable we are. -[villager 3] Okay.
[Den] And when we have fulfilled our side of the deal,
they will be forced to rethink how much food they leave us.
translation.es: tendrán que repensar cuánto alimento nos dejan.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah.
We can appeal to those gentlemen in the granary, appeal to their humanity.
translation.es: Podemos apelar a la humanidad de los caballeros del granero.

translation.en: -[villager 3] Yeah. -Good.
So… it's running.
Would've thought you'd have had enough of that.
translation.es: Creí que te habías cansado de eso.

translation.en: You heard them. They're delusional.
They think those soldiers will show mercy even after what they did to Sindri,
translation.es: Esperan piedad, y vieron lo que pasó con Sindri

translation.en: right in front of them.
When I found you in the wreckage of that ship,
translation.es: Cuando te vi entre los restos de esa nave,

translation.en: I considered leaving you.
I was afraid you could bring trouble to us.
But do I for a moment regret bringing you into our lives?
translation.es: Pero ¿lamento por un instante haberte traído a nuestras vidas?

translation.en: I do not.
You've become a part of us.
And yet, now you leave when we need you most.
translation.es: Sin embargo, te marchas cuando más te necesitamos.

translation.en: When your people need you.
I can't.
You mean, you won't?
This place is already lost.
But what if that could change?
What if we did fight, not only us, but others?
translation.es: ¿Y si lucháramos no solo nosotros, sino otros?

translation.en: -Who else would come here and fight? -Others! Others!
Others that have reason to hate all that the Motherworld represents.
translation.es: Otros con motivos para odiar todo lo que simboliza el Mundo Madre.

translation.en: Kora, you know this universe better than I.
translation.es: Kora, conoces este universo mejor que yo.

translation.en: What if you could find the warriors that Noble seeks?
translation.es: ¿Y si hallaras a los guerreros que persigue ese tal Noble?

translation.en: The outlaws to fight alongside us?
translation.es: ¿A los forajidos, para que luchen a nuestro lado?

translation.en: If I find warriors to fight for Veldt, I give the village hope.
translation.es: Si hallo guerreros para Veldt, la aldea tendrá esperanza.

translation.en: If I give them hope, they fight and surely lose.
I won't have that blood on my hands.
translation.es: No quiero su sangre en las manos.

translation.en: Nor will I throw my life away the same as the rest of you.
translation.es: Tampoco dar mi vida por nada como todos ustedes.

translation.en: Check this.
Hey, water girl!
-[Marcus] Come here. -[Sam] What is it?
Did you need some more water?
Just a… a little water.
Stop it!
[Marcus] Or what?
-[Marcus yells] -[Sam shouting] Help! Help!
Please, help!
Help!
-Shut up! -Get off me!
-Help me! -[Marcus] Shut up!
[Sam] No. Please!
-[Marcus] Shut up. -Someone help me, please! Please, help!
translation.es: - Cállate. - ¡Que alguien me ayude, por favor!

translation.en: -Help me! Get off of me! -[Marcus] Shut up!
Get off me! [screaming]
[Aris] Don't!
Attaboy. What do you have in mind?
I'm gonna tie you to a post and make you watch every day
translation.es: Voy a atarte a un poste y hacerte mirar todos los días

translation.en: as she turns from a farm girl to a whore.
translation.es: cómo ella pasa de granjera a prostituta.

translation.en: Marcus, my good man…
This all sounds nice,
but you're not gonna do anything.
Not until I split this sapling myself.
translation.es: No hasta que la estrene yo.

translation.en: Then you may have her.
Then you can all have her.
-[Sam screams] -Get off her!
[Kora] Stop!
Stop.
Dessert. [chuckles maliciously] Perfect.
Definitely get her.
Please.
[commander] I will kill her.
Is that what you want? Huh?
Ah, look who decided to join us.
Kill her. Kill them both.
What are you waiting for? I gave you an order.
Kill this b…
We're gonna have to fight.
[man] Kora, you may need this.
I found it at the site of the crash.
I thought it was lost.
Our culture is not for such weapons.
translation.es: Nuestra cultura no sabe de estas armas.

translation.en: I feared it could be dangerous.
You were right.
Thank you.
Where will you go?
There is someone, a general named Titus.
translation.es: Hay alguien, un general llamado Titus.

translation.en: Once a hero of the Realm
who turned his own forces against those of the Motherworld.
translation.es: y usó sus fuerzas contra las del Mundo Madre.

translation.en: Last I heard, he was still out there somewhere.
If I could find him and men for him to lead…
translation.es: Si diera con él y hombres para que él guíe…

translation.en: Last year, in Providence, you sold grain to the resistance.
translation.es: El año pasado, en Providence, le vendiste a la resistencia.

translation.en: Yes. I met a man there who introduced me to the insurgents.
translation.es: Sí. Conocí a un hombre allí que me presentó a los insurgentes.

translation.en: The Bloodaxes.
-Would he still know how to find them? -It's possible.
translation.es: - ¿Aún serías capaz de hallarlos? - Es posible.

translation.en: Then you'll take me to him?
Of course I will.
[Gunnar] Hey! Bring down one more uraki!
A general and an army?
We might stand a chance.
translation.es: Tal vez no todo esté perdido.

translation.en: Be careful.
A safe journey… to the both of you.
[Gunnar] So you were a soldier for the Motherworld?
Fighting for the Realm?
[Kora] You could say that.
Of high rank, I suppose?
I mean, are you wanted for desertion?
That and more.
Okay.
Anything else you wanna ask me?
[Gunnar] They won't just kill us, will they?
I mean, I understand making an example of Sindri
translation.es: Entiendo que dieran un ejemplo con Sindri

translation.en: to keep us in line.
But we're just farmers, we're not a threat.
translation.es: pero somos granjeros, no una amenaza.

translation.en: How can you know they will destroy us?
When they first came to my world, I was nine years old.
translation.es: Cuando llegaron a mi mundo, yo tenía nueve años.

translation.en: They never asked for anything.
There were no terms.
[Kora] Only the lust for destruction.
The Motherworld's forces were commanded by a young general named Balisarius,
translation.es: Al mando de las fuerzas del Mundo Madre iba un joven general llamado Balisarius

translation.en: who relished the ecstasy of combat.
translation.es: que gozaba del éxtasis del combate.

translation.en: The people of my world had mounted a brave defense,
translation.es: La gente de mi mundo se había defendido con valentía,

translation.en: but it had served only to enrage the young general
translation.es: pero así solo habían logrado enfurecer al joven general

translation.en: and gave him provocation to take out that anger on the innocent.
translation.es: y darle la excusa para descargar su ira con los inocentes.

translation.en: I found myself face-to-face with Balisarius,
translation.es: Yo me hallé frente a frente con Balisarius,

translation.en: who loved commanding his troops,
not from the conning tower of his ships,
translation.es: no desde la torre de mando de sus naves,

translation.en: but on the battlefield itself.
translation.es: sino en el campo de batalla.

translation.en: [Kora] Balisarius killed my entire family and took me with him.
translation.es: Balisarius mató a mi familia entera y me llevó con él.

translation.en: I don't know why he spared me.
translation.es: No sé por qué me perdonó la vida.

translation.en: Why, of the hundreds of thousands that died at his hands,
translation.es: Por qué, de los cientos de miles que masacró,

translation.en: he chose me to live.
Saw something in me, I suppose.
translation.es: Supongo que vio algo en mí.

translation.en: Someone to share in his pain.
translation.es: Alguien con quien compartir su dolor.

translation.en: They gave me the name Arthelais,
began my training and education in the histories of the Motherworld.
translation.es: y me entrenaron y enseñaron las historias del Mundo Madre.

translation.en: And for five years, I lived on that ship with its soldiers,
translation.es: Durante cinco años, viví en esa nave con sus soldados,

translation.en: who were my only family.
No softness.
Only the hard lessons of war.
translation.es: Solo las duras lecciones de la guerra.

translation.en: He took me often on missions of diplomacy,
translation.es: A menudo, él me llevaba en misiones diplomáticas.

translation.en: and I was his child.
I was his protégé. I was his student.
I was one of them.
Daughter of a decorated commander.
Friend to the King and the royal family.
translation.es: Fui amiga del rey y la familia real

translation.en: -Living a life of privilege. -[muted dialogue]
[Kora] But regardless of my social standing, I was expected to do my duty.
translation.es: Pero, al margen de mi estatus social, yo debía cumplir mi deber.

translation.en: To fight for the Motherworld.
At the Academy Militarium, they encouraged us to find a lover.
translation.es: En la Academia Militar, te incentivan a buscarte un amante.

translation.en: Someone we would defend with our lives
translation.es: Alguien a quien defender con la vida

translation.en: when the politics of expansion became too abstract,
translation.es: cuando la política de expansión es abstracta,

translation.en: and the why of the conquest was lost in sheer savagery of combat.
translation.es: y la razón de la conquista se pierde en el salvajismo del combate.

translation.en: Come on! Let's go! Come on!
[Kora] So, at the age of 18, I was made an officer and given a command.
translation.es: Así que a los 18 años, me convertí en oficial y recibí mis órdenes.

translation.en: [Kora] I fought for the King on distant worlds
translation.es: Luché por el rey en mundos distantes,

translation.en: under the banner of a people who murdered my entire family
translation.es: bajo la bandera de la gente que asesinó a toda mi familia

translation.en: and destroyed my world.
They had trained me,
broken me, and rebuilt me in their image.
translation.es: quebrado y reconstruido a su imagen.

translation.en: I'm only telling you this so you know who I am.
translation.es: Te lo estoy contando para que sepas quién soy.

translation.en: You asked how I know that they'll destroy you.
translation.es: Preguntaste cómo sé que los destruirán.

translation.en: That's what I would do.
Hawkshaws.
Bounty hunters. They work for the Imperium.
Wait.
-[man screams] -[Gunnar] Oh, no.
That's our guy. That's the man we came to see.
translation.es: Es el hombre al que venimos a ver.

translation.en: The one that introduced me to the Bloodaxes.
translation.es: El que me presentó a los Bloodaxe.

translation.en: Did the Bloodaxes give you any other way to contact them?
translation.es: ¿Te dieron algún otro medio de contacto?

translation.en: No. They said they were sheltered on a planet called Sharaan.
translation.es: No. Dijeron que se refugiaban en un planeta llamado Sharaan,

translation.en: -Protected by a king named Levitica. -Levitica.
translation.es: - protegidos por el rey Levitica. - Levitica.

translation.en: Come.
Anyway, I think our best chance to find the Bloodaxes
translation.es: Creo que el mejor modo de hallar a los Bloodaxe

translation.en: is to contact the Leviticans.
[Kora] It might expose us.
First we find General Titus, then we'll see about your rebels.
translation.es: Busquemos al general Titus. Luego, a tus rebeldes.

translation.en: Is this your owner?
Move on. He's not for sale.
translation.es: Lárgate. No está a la venta.

translation.en: Everything's for sale in this place, so… [inhales sharply] how much?
translation.es: Aquí todo está a la venta. ¿Cuánto?

translation.en: You know, I have a room upstairs…
…with relatively clean sheets.
That's a very generous offer. But I don't think so…
translation.es: Es una oferta muy generosa. Pero no…

translation.en: I guarantee you, by morning,
translation.es: Te garantizo que, para la mañana,

translation.en: you're gonna be begging me for more.
-I said, move on. -[scoffs]
-Come on, Mama. -[tense music plays]
-Whoa, whoa, whoa. -Let him come and play.
You need to leave.
Listen close, you jealous little bitch.
Now you listen close. I told you, you need to leave.
translation.es: Tú escucha bien. Te dije que te fueras.

translation.en: I'm looking for information.
Has anyone here heard of General Titus or know where he might be?
translation.es: ¿Alguien oyó hablar del general Titus o sabe dónde puede estar?

translation.en: Of course, General Titus.
Crazy bastard. Turned his own men on the Motherworld's forces [grunts]
translation.es: Un loco desgraciado. Combatió contra el Mundo Madre

translation.en: at the Battle of Sarawu.
Do you know of his location?
Last I heard, he was fighting in the coliseum at Pollux.
translation.es: Lo último que supe fue que peleaba en el coliseo de Pólux.

translation.en: I'd be careful if I were you, little miss.
translation.es: Si fuera usted, tendría cuidado, señorita.

translation.en: Last hunter who went looking for him ended up with his head on a pike
translation.es: El último cazador que fue por él acabó con la cabeza en una pica

translation.en: outside the coliseum entrance
as a warning not to bother him.
So, he's on Pollux.
-That's your plan? -That's my plan.
translation.es: - ¿Ese es tu plan? - Ese es mi plan.

translation.en: What?
Guess we need to find a ship to take us to Pollux.
translation.es: Necesitamos una nave para ir allá.

translation.en: You're catching on.
Hey! Bitch!
You should have killed me.
Now you're gonna die.
I'm gonna give you one chance to just turn and walk away.
translation.es: Tienes una sola oportunidad de dar la vuelta e irte.

translation.en: Are you gonna give all of us one chance?
-Kill her. -[gun powers up]
Impressive.
[Kora] Were those Hawkshaws that paid you working for the Motherworld?
translation.es: ¿Los halcones que te pagaron servían en el Mundo Madre?

translation.en: -I don't like bounty hunters. -[man] I didn't ask.
translation.es: - Detesto a los cazarrecompensas. - No pregunté.

translation.en: And to be clear, I don't like bounty hunters either.
translation.es: Y para que quede claro, yo también los detesto.

translation.en: [Kora] So you're a gun for hire?
No. That's not my thing.
translation.es: No. Eso no es lo mío.

translation.en: I'm more of an opportunist, you might say.
translation.es: Soy más bien un oportunista, por así decirlo.

translation.en: A real hero, huh?
Wait.
Look. I heard you in there,
translation.es: Miren. Oí lo que dijeron ahí,

translation.en: trying to get to Pollux.
I could help you.
Oh, understand, we're just simple farmers.
We're searching for soldiers for a fight against the Motherworld.
translation.es: Buscamos soldados para enfrentar al Mundo Madre.

translation.en: We have some money, but this is not the one you get rich on.
translation.es: Tenemos algo de dinero, pero no te harás rico.

translation.en: Aye, I understand.
Still, pay me what it's worth to you.
translation.es: Pueden pagarme lo que les parezca.

translation.en: Soldiers for a fight against the Motherworld?
Well, my name's Kai.
Come on, my ship's down at port.
translation.es: Vamos, tengo mi nave en el puerto.

translation.en: Right. Setting course for Pollux.
[Kai] I need to stop on Neu-Wodi first.
You know, there's a rancher there.
He has a man that might just work out for you.
translation.es: Tiene un hombre que quizá les sirva.

translation.en: Is he worth our time?
Because we can't afford to waste any.
I think you'll like him.
You ever been off-planet?
What did you do on the farm?
I oversee the harvest, and planting, cataloguing seeds, and making sure that…
translation.es: Superviso la cosecha, la plantación, catalogo semillas y vigilo que…

translation.en: That sounds great. You might want to hold on.
Come in.
Oh, Cassius, it's you. Good.
[Cassius] We received a communiqué from the Hawkshaws.
translation.es: Recibimos un comunicado de los halcones.

translation.en: They're requesting to rendezvous with us.
Apparently they've captured a creature
translation.es: Al parecer, capturaron a una criatura

translation.en: that has important information about the insurgents,
translation.es: que tiene información clave sobre los insurgentes,

translation.en: Devra Bloodaxe and her brother.
Bloodaxe? Huh.
-Well, that… -[creatures chitter]
That's excellent, Cassius.
Inform me when they arrive.
-[Cassius] Yes, sir. -Hey.
Well, if it isn't the bastard from Saaldorun.
-What brings you all the way out here? -I missed your smiling face.
translation.es: - ¿Qué te trae hasta aquí? - Extrañaba tu sonrisa.

translation.en: You still got that man chained in the back?
translation.es: ¿Aún tienes a ese tipo encadenado atrás?

translation.en: Tarak? Yeah, he's working off his debt to me.
translation.es: ¿Tarak? Sí, trabaja para pagar su deuda.

translation.en: Another couple dozen seasons, we should be square.
translation.es: Unas 25 estaciones más, y estamos a mano.

translation.en: What's it to you?
You mind if we talk to him?
Could be a deal in it for ya.
Well, if there's money to be made…
Hey!
Hey! Tarak!
[man] These people want to talk to you.
-What got that chain on your leg? -[Tarak] A long road of mistakes.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué la cadena? - Por una larga serie de errores.

translation.en: But if you're here to accuse me of crimes against the Motherworld,
translation.es: Si van a acusarme de crímenes contra el Mundo Madre,

translation.en: I'm guilty as charged. Take it up with him.
No. That's not why we're here.
We're here from a small village, and we're looking to hire some fighters
translation.es: Somos de una pequeña aldea y buscamos contratar a guerreros

translation.en: to train and protect us against a force from the Motherworld.
translation.es: para entrenarnos y protegernos de una fuerza del Mundo Madre.

translation.en: -I'm no friend of the Realm. -Okay.
translation.es: - No soy amigo del Reino. - Bien.

translation.en: [Tarak] That's well-known.
And I'd gladly fight with you,
but… I have a debt on my name,
translation.es: pero hay una deuda a mi nombre,

translation.en: and I honor my debts.
What's he owe you?
300,000 Darams ought to cover any inconvenience I've suffered.
translation.es: Unas 300 000 darams cubrirían todos mis perjuicios.

translation.en: Oh, ya bollocks.
We don't have that kind of money.
No money.
Well, I do love to gamble.
Here we go.
What's the bet?
If Tarak can break that creature out there, his debts are squared with me.
translation.es: Si Tarak doma a ese animal de afuera, su deuda queda saldada.

translation.en: [man] But if he don't ride him,
you all get a chain and a shackle.
translation.es: todos ustedes acaban con cadena y grillete.

translation.en: That's the deal.
[man] Grab it tighter!
Watch its tail!
Can you ride him?
Yeah… I can ride him.
[man] Yank it hard! Don't let him fight you like that!
translation.es: ¡Jala fuerte! ¡No dejes que se resista así!

translation.en: Drop your leads.
She'll tear you apart.
Drop your leads and clear out now.
translation.es: Suelten sus sogas y apártense. Ya.

translation.en: Suit yourself. Drop them.
[in Samandrait] I'm not going to hurt you.
You're far from home and so am I.
translation.es: Estás lejos de tu hogar, al igual que yo.

translation.en: See, you and I…
…we are alike.
We've been hurt. Betrayed.
translation.es: Nos han hecho daño. Nos traicionaron. Perdimos la confianza.

translation.en: Our trust has been broken.
We both know fear.
Yet, the biggest fear we both face…
translation.es: Y el peor miedo que enfrentamos…

translation.en: …is the fear of ourselves.
translation.es: es el miedo a nosotros mismos.

translation.en: [in English] That's it.
[in Samandrait] Let's show them we're not afraid.
Let's show them we're more than the shackles that bind us.
translation.es: Mostremos que somos más que los grilletes que nos sujetan.

translation.en: [in English] Easy. Easy. Easy. Let's go. Let's go.
There.
Yeah.
It's okay.
Hickman, I've done as you asked.
Your debt is square with me.
Be good to her.
[men] Go! Get out!
-[Hickman] Hey! -[bennu screeches]
Hey.
No. No.
Attagirl.
[Gunnar] Tarak! Let's go.
This was good. Anyone else you know of along the way?
translation.es: Esto estuvo bien. ¿Algún otro conocido de camino?

translation.en: I might have a couple ideas.
translation.es: Quizá tenga un par de ideas.

translation.en: [woman] So, what's the job?
We represent a village on a small moon called Veldt.
translation.es: Representamos a una aldea en un pequeño planeta llamado Veldt.

translation.en: This village faces the threat of annihilation by the armies of the Motherworld.
translation.es: Corre riesgo de ser aniquilada por ejércitos del Mundo Madre.

translation.en: We are looking for warriors
to join the fight to protect them.
translation.es: que se unan a la lucha.

translation.en: With your reputation,
we thought it might be something you'd be interested in.
translation.es: pensamos que tal vez te interesara.

translation.en: -Nemesis, please, please. -Hold her.
Help her. Please, please.
[Harmada] Stay back.
I just want to talk. That's all.
I'm clearly distressed, that's true.
But I'm not stupid.
I know why you're here. You want the child.
translation.es: Sé a qué viniste. Quieres a la niña.

translation.en: Yes, I do.
[Harmada] You can't have this one.
This one is mine.
She has a mother who's waiting for her.
translation.es: Tiene una madre que la espera.

translation.en: Who's missing her.
And why should I care about that mother's pain
translation.es: ¿Por qué me importaría el dolor de esa madre

translation.en: when no one is here for my pain?
translation.es: si a nadie le importa el mío?

translation.en: -[child whimpers] -This was my home before they came.
translation.es: Antes de que ellos llegaran, este era mi hogar.

translation.en: Taste the air.
It's poisoned my body.
It weakens my eggs, and now, my children cannot emerge.
translation.es: Debilita mis huevos, y ahora mis hijos no pueden emerger.

translation.en: I deserve justice.
[Nemesis] I understand.
But this is not the way.
translation.es: Pero esta no es la manera.

translation.en: There is a difference between justice and revenge.
translation.es: Existe una diferencia entre justicia y venganza.

translation.en: Is there?
I'm not so sure.
I know a mother's pain.
I know the loneliness of that pain.
translation.es: Conozco la soledad de ese dolor.

translation.en: But you can't hurt that child.
translation.es: Pero no lastimarás a la niña.

translation.en: I won't let you.
I believe you. But understand.
-I will kill this child. -[child sobs]
And I will keep killing until every mother weeps tears of regret
translation.es: y continuaré matando hasta que toda madre llore arrepentida

translation.en: for ever having come to the mines of Daggus.
translation.es: por haber venido a las minas de Daggus.

translation.en: Shit!
Come on.
Let's go.
Come. Back up! Back up!
-[child whimpers] -Come here.
Wow. That was…
That was amazing.
Do not celebrate this.
There's no honor in this.
This could easily be any of you lying here
translation.es: Podría ser cualquiera de ustedes quien yace aquí

translation.en: in the gutter of some forgotten world,
translation.es: en las entrañas de un mundo olvidado

translation.en: in the name of revenge.
You would do well to remember that.
That was good of you earlier. With the child.
translation.es: Estuviste bien antes. Con la niña.

translation.en: -I was just trying to help. -Yes, but it's not natural for some.
translation.es: - Solo trataba de ayudar. - Pero no es natural para todos.

translation.en: [Gunnar] It is for you.
Back home, you saved Sam without hesitation.
translation.es: En casa, salvaste a Sam sin dudarlo.

translation.en: Kindness is a virtue worth dying for.
translation.es: Vale la pena morir por la virtud de la bondad.

translation.en: I believe that.
I didn't always.
I told you how I fought on countless worlds.
translation.es: Te conté que luché en innumerables mundos.

translation.en: Well, word of my victories reached my adopted father.
translation.es: Mis victorias llegaron a oídos de mi padre adoptivo…

translation.en: And the King.
[Kora] For my loyalty and service,
I was promoted to the Elite Guard of the Royal Family.
translation.es: me ascendieron a guardia de élite de la familia real.

translation.en: The appointment was engineered by my father.
translation.es: El nombramiento fue obra de mi padre.

translation.en: I couldn't have known it was something more.
translation.es: No podía saber que era algo más.

translation.en: I was given the honor
of being the bodyguard to Princess Issa.
translation.es: de ser guardaespaldas de la princesa Issa.

translation.en: The princess was named after an ancient Queen Issa,
translation.es: La princesa llevaba el nombre de una antigua reina: Issa,

translation.en: the Lifegiver.
In the old stories of the queen,
it was said that she had the power to give life.
translation.es: se decía que la reina tenía el poder de dar vida.

translation.en: It seemed a myth or a metaphor
translation.es: Parecía un mito o una metáfora

translation.en: created in response to the generations of war and conquest.
translation.es: en reacción a las generaciones de guerra y conquista.

translation.en: Yet, the story still captured the imagination of the people.
translation.es: Pero la historia cautivó a la gente.

translation.en: And it was believed that the princess, my princess, might have that same power.
translation.es: Y se creía que la princesa, mi princesa, tenía el mismo poder.

translation.en: I saw on more than one occasion things that I… couldn't explain.
translation.es: En más de una ocasión, vi cosas que… no podía explicar.

translation.en: Things that made me think that she was different.
translation.es: Cosas que me llevaban a pensar que ella era diferente.

translation.en: Special.
The King once said to me…
translation.es: Una vez, el rey me dijo…

translation.en: When she becomes queen,
I believe she'll bring a compassion that I've lost
translation.es: creo que aportará la compasión que yo he perdido

translation.en: after all these hard years of war.
translation.es: tras tantos duros años de guerra.

translation.en: [Kora] "It will be the dawn of something better."
-I think your friendship makes her safer. -That our friendship made her safer.
translation.es: - Su amistad la protege. - Que nuestra amistad la protegía.

translation.en: I believed in her.
In her kindness.
I believed in her ability to save us.
translation.es: Creía en su capacidad de salvarnos.

translation.en: The great General Titus.
Thank you.
[Gunnar] Okay.
Are you sure this is a good idea?
Let's clean him up and get him sober.
translation.es: Vamos a limpiarlo y a ponerlo sobrio.

translation.en: -Yeah, that'll do it. -[Tarak] Come on.
-[Gunnar] Come on. -[Kai] You got him.
-[Tarak] Come on. -Get off me! [yells]
What do you think you're doing?
That's enough. Thank you.
Did you command the Eastern ranks for the Old King?
translation.es: ¿Comandó los rangos orientales del antiguo rey?

translation.en: Are you not General Titus? A legend.
translation.es: ¿No es acaso el general Titus? Una leyenda.

translation.en: I don't know what you're running your mouth about.
Why can't you just leave me alone?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dejas en paz?

translation.en: Because my best hope is that long-ago general is still in front of me.
translation.es: Porque mi mejor esperanza es tener enfrente a ese general de antaño.

translation.en: What do you want from me?
My men are dead because of my surrender.
translation.es: Mis hombres murieron porque me rendí.

translation.en: I'm tired of reliving that nightmare every day.
translation.es: Estoy cansado de revivir esa pesadilla día tras día.

translation.en: Now, please, leave me and let me die in peace.
translation.es: Ahora váyanse, por favor, y déjenme morir en paz.

translation.en: I don't think you're meant to die here…
translation.es: No creo que su destino sea morir aquí…

translation.en: Stop calling me that. I have no rank, no privilege.
translation.es: Deja de llamarme así. No poseo rango ni privilegio.

translation.en: I'm here to make you an offer.
To give you a chance at redemption.
-I am beyond redemption. -I have no time for pity!
translation.es: - No existe redención para mí. - ¡No tengo tiempo para la lástima!

translation.en: What about all the dead men you once commanded?
translation.es: ¿Y todos los muertos que otrora comandó?

translation.en: What about them?
If not redemption,
what about revenge?
This is the man who knows where the insurgents are?
It is, sir.
Well, I'm listening.
You'll let me go if I tell you what I know?
translation.es: ¿Me dejará ir si le digo lo que sé?

translation.en: I'll set you free, you have my word.
translation.es: Lo liberaré. Le doy mi palabra.

translation.en: I haven't seen Devra Bloodaxe for a full season,
translation.es: Llevo una estación entera sin ver a Devra Bloodaxe,

translation.en: but at the time they were on Sharaan, under the protection of a king called…
translation.es: pero entonces estaban en Sharaan, bajo la protección de un rey llamado…

translation.en: [Noble] Go on.
This was some time ago, but they were definitely there.
translation.es: Fue hace tiempo, pero sin duda estaban ahí.

translation.en: Talk to him, to Levitica.
I certainly will. Thank you.
Thought we had a deal!
Yes, we did.
You're free.
[Noble] Dissect his brain and see if we can find out any more information.
translation.es: Analicen su cerebro a ver si podemos extraer algún dato más.

translation.en: Then we'll go pay our respects to King Levitica.
translation.es: Luego iremos a saludar al rey Levitica.

translation.en: [Cassius] Yes, Admiral. I'll set a course for Sharaan.
translation.es: Sí, almirante. Fijaré el rumbo a Sharaan.

translation.en: Let's go.
[in Sharaanese] Your patience is appreciated and I can assure you…
translation.es: Se aprecia su paciencia. Y le aseguro

translation.en: …Devra is aware of your presence.
translation.es: que Devra está al tanto de su presencia.

translation.en: A decision when to receive you is imminent.
translation.es: La decisión de cuándo recibirlos es inminente.

translation.en: Thank you, Levitica, honored king.
We await their arrival.
-[distant boom] -[Gunnar in English] Look.
Farmer, why would you contact us from this unknown and flagless vessel?
translation.es: Granjero, ¿por qué nos contactas desde esta nave desconocida y sin bandera?

translation.en: I was assuming we had a level of trust after our last meeting.
translation.es: Tras nuestra última reunión, supuse que teníamos cierta confianza.

translation.en: We bought your grain to feed our fighters.
translation.es: Compramos tus granos para alimentar a los combatientes.

translation.en: Do not confuse your business of commerce with our business of revolution.
translation.es: No confundas tu negocio con nuestra revolución.

translation.en: [Gunnar] I understand.
Your coming here is a great risk to us all and to our benefactor.
translation.es: Esta visita representa un gran riesgo para todos nosotros y nuestro benefactor.

translation.en: But we are no longer in need of your grain.
translation.es: Pero ya no necesitamos tus granos.

translation.en: King Levitica's kindness has been more than enough to sustain us,
translation.es: La bondad del rey Levitica ha sido más que suficiente,

translation.en: so I suggest you leave immediately.
translation.es: así que sugiero que partan de inmediato.

translation.en: [Kora] We're not here to sell grain.
Gunnar's village was visited by a Dreadnought that threatens its very existence.
translation.es: Un acorazado visitó la aldea de Gunnar y amenaza su existencia.

translation.en: I have recruited these warriors
and given my word to bring them back and defend the farmers.
translation.es: y di mi palabra de llevarlos a defender a los granjeros.

translation.en: -But we're running out of time. -What?
translation.es: - Pero se nos acaba el tiempo. - ¿Qué?

translation.en: This handful? Against a Dreadnought?
That's why we have come. You have men and ships.
translation.es: Por eso venimos. Ustedes tienen hombres y naves.

translation.en: With you we could mount a real defense.
And, of course, we can pay you with the surplus from our harvest.
translation.es: Y, por supuesto, les pagaremos con el excedente de nuestra cosecha.

translation.en: It's all we've got.
[Devra] My forces against the King's Gaze?
translation.es: ¿Mis fuerzas contra la Mirada del Rey?

translation.en: That's suicide.
That ship cannot be destroyed by a few dozen fighters.
translation.es: Unos cuantos combatientes no destruirán esa nave.

translation.en: That ship and the men aboard it are world destroyers.
translation.es: Esa nave y los hombres que lleva a bordo son destructores de mundos.

translation.en: I'm sorry, it's impossible.
[Kora] This man is not a revolutionary.
translation.es: Este hombre no es un revolucionario.

translation.en: He's a simple farmer.
But commerce or not,
his people toiled with their bare hands to grow the grain that fed you. All of you!
translation.es: su gente labró la tierra con las manos para alimentarlos a ustedes. ¡A todos!

translation.en: And because of that transaction,
their village is now threatened by Admiral Noble,
translation.es: su aldea fue amenazada por el almirante Noble,

translation.en: in pursuit of your revolution.
translation.es: que busca acabar con su revolución.

translation.en: I see.
I will go.
Thank you.
Brother, a word.
Our victories, what few there have been, have been tactical ones.
translation.es: Nuestras pocas victorias han sido siempre tácticas.

translation.en: We cannot fight in the open against the King's Gaze.
translation.es: No podemos contra la Mirada del Rey.

translation.en: If the farmer found us, it won't be long before Noble does.
translation.es: Si el granjero nos encontró, pronto también nos encontrará Noble.

translation.en: And I will not allow another world to fall in our name.
translation.es: Y no dejaré que caiga otro mundo en nuestro nombre.

translation.en: And what of those you command?
[Darrian] Their lives are theirs.
These people, they've come to us with
nowhere else to turn.
translation.es: porque no tienen a nadie más.

translation.en: They come… …seeking our help…
translation.es: Vienen en busca de nuestra ayuda

translation.en: …to stand against a Dreadnought of the Motherworld.
translation.es: contra un acorazado del Mundo Madre.

translation.en: Is that not what we stand for?
translation.es: ¿No es eso por lo que luchamos?

translation.en: Are they not who we once were?
translation.es: ¿No son ellos quienes una vez fuimos?

translation.en: If we will not stand with these defiant farmers to protect their home,
translation.es: Si no ayudamos a proteger el hogar de estos granjeros desafiantes,

translation.en: then the revolution is meaningless.
Under free will,
who among you is willing to die for what we believe
translation.es: ¿quiénes están dispuestos a morir por nuestro ideal

translation.en: rather than hide behind it?
translation.es: en lugar de ocultarse tras él?

translation.en: [Darrian] Milius.
Why am I not surprised?
Who is going to make sure you'll return in one piece, if not me?
translation.es: ¿Quién se asegurará de que vuelvas entero si no voy?

translation.en: Thank Levitica and leave this planet.
translation.es: Agradece a Levitica y abandona el planeta.

translation.en: Sister, until we meet again.
translation.es: Hermana, hasta que volvamos a vernos.

translation.en: Maybe this isn't suicide after all.
Why would he agree to help you?
Bloodaxe? You think they shouldn't?
It just seems short-sighted.
I mean, he weakens what little of
whatever word you wanna use for it there is…
translation.es: que queda de como quieras llamarla…

translation.en: Resistance, insurgency.
For what, Kora?
The chance to get obliterated by a Dreadnought?
Guilt, it's a powerful thing.
translation.es: La culpa es una fuerza poderosa.

translation.en: [Kai] Aye, guilt. The underbelly of honor.
translation.es: Sí, la culpa. El bajo fondo del honor.

translation.en: I think I might've had that once.
translation.es: Quizá yo lo haya tenido alguna vez.

translation.en: Would you believe that?
It's true.
I mean, what do you figure?
I got ten, fifteen more seasons at most, before I steal from the wrong man.
translation.es: Tengo diez, 15 estaciones, como mucho, antes de que le robe al hombre equivocado.

translation.en: Get stabbed to death by some dog-headed son of a bitch in a bar fight.
translation.es: Antes de que algún terco hijo de puta me apuñale en un bar.

translation.en: It's really your fault, anyway.
Makin' me wanna be an honorable man.
translation.es: Este deseo de ser un hombre honorable.

translation.en: If you had more resisting power to speak of, you wouldn't need me to join you so badly.
translation.es: Si tuvieran más resistencia, no necesitarían tanto que me uniera.

translation.en: You're willing to fight with us?
Since you're beggin'.
Kai, we're not.
Well, since you're asking, then.
If you'll allow me.
Wow.
There is one complication.
The shite in the cargo hold.
translation.es: Lo que llevo en la bodega.

translation.en: I got buyers waiting in Gondival.
Aren't the kinds known for their patience.
translation.es: Y no son famosos por su paciencia.

translation.en: Might be wise to sever my ties to life as a thief before we go picking a fight with a Dreadnought.
translation.es: Quizá deba poner fin a mi vida como ladrón antes de ir a luchar con un acorazado.

translation.en: Besides, you said yourself you need me.
-I did not say that. -I think you did.
translation.es: - No dije eso. - Creo que sí.

translation.en: I'll set the course and let 'em know we're on our way.
translation.es: Fijaré el rumbo y les avisaré que vamos.

translation.en: Oh, shit, does that make me one of the good guys?
translation.es: Mierda, ¿ahora soy uno de los buenos?

translation.en: [in Sharaanese] I beg you…
[in English] Please!
I've told you the truth.
I have nothing more.
[Noble] Right. [scoffs] The truth…
…that you took them in, known enemies of the Motherworld,
translation.es: es que asiló a notorios enemigos del Mundo Madre,

translation.en: mended their wounds, repaired their broken ships,
translation.es: curó sus heridas, reparó sus naves averiadas,

translation.en: all out of your moral code of honor and charity.
translation.es: todo por seguir su código moral de honor y caridad.

translation.en: Our civilization has lived and thrived for 10,000 years
translation.es: Nuestra civilización ha vivido y prosperado por 10 000 años

translation.en: with honor and charity as its most valued tenets.
translation.es: guiada por los principios del honor y la caridad.

translation.en: Yes. Yes, honor and charity.
translation.es: Sí. Sí, el honor y la caridad.

translation.en: Do you see that?
That ship is named the King's Gaze.
translation.es: Esa nave se llama Mirada del Rey.

translation.en: It was named to honor our slain father.
translation.es: En honor de nuestro padre caído.

translation.en: So…
honor I understand.
Charity, I do not.
Our King showed charity to an off-worlder like yourself
translation.es: Nuestro rey mostró caridad a un extranjero como usted,

translation.en: and was slaughtered for his charity.
So, we named the ship to remind us of the power in that benevolent gaze
translation.es: La nave fue así bautizada en memoria del poder de esa mirada benevolente

translation.en: that was lost to charity.
translation.es: que se perdió por culpa de la caridad.

translation.en: And to remember that, if by God's will, that gaze should fall upon us and be held,
translation.es: Y para recordar que, si Dios quiere que dicha mirada se pose sobre nosotros,

translation.en: for even the briefest of moments,
translation.es: aunque más no sea por un instante,

translation.en: it could change your life forever.
Today, it falls upon you.
We are cleared to engage.
-[systems beep] -Confirmed.
[commander] Fire at will.
[Cassius] Sir, we received a message from one of our Hawkshaws.
translation.es: Señor, recibimos mensaje de uno de los halcones.

translation.en: They're closing in on the Bloodaxes.
Finally, some good news.
Well, prepare the hyperlaunch.
I'll go ahead and personally retrieve the treasonous dogs myself.
translation.es: Iré yo mismo a buscar a los perros traicioneros.

translation.en: And what orders for the King's Gaze, sir?
translation.es: ¿Órdenes para la Mirada del Rey, señor?

translation.en: Well, once you've razed the planet,
we'll rendezvous, extract the exact location of the rest of the insurgents,
translation.es: nos reuniremos, extraeremos la ubicación de los demás insurgentes

translation.en: and destroy them once and for all.
translation.es: y los destruiremos de una buena vez.

translation.en: [Cassius] Yes, sir.
[Gunnar] I'm pretty sure Kai said these boxes.
translation.es: Kai dijo que eran estas cajas.

translation.en: -[Titus] We've got one. -[Gunnar] Okay.
Aye, just take the gray ones.
-They're all marked. -All right.
For God's sake, don't look inside. I'd hate you to think less of me.
translation.es: Por Dios, no miren el contenido. No quiero que piensen mal de mí.

translation.en: Where do you want them?
-There's space behind the bridge. -Done.
translation.es: - Hay espacio bajo el puente. - Bien.

translation.en: All right, put them the other side of the bridge.
translation.es: Déjenlas del otro lado del puente.

translation.en: Aye, let's unload and get off this godforsaken rock.
translation.es: Descarguemos y vámonos de esta roca desolada.

translation.en: I'll be happy to leave this life behind.
translation.es: Me alegrará dejar atrás esta vida.

translation.en: Good.
[Hawkshaw] Just wanna make sure that one's on the manifest.
[Darrian] Pilots!
Once you tie off those ships, see if you can get some fuel.
translation.es: Tras amarrar esas naves, intenten cargar combustible.

translation.en: And you two, keep eyes from above!
How we lookin'?
Everything is done.
-[Kai] All right, let's move. -[Hawkshaw] Yes.
-[comms beeps] -On your mark.
This isn't right.
On your knees.
Now is not the time to be a hero.
translation.es: No es momento para ser héroe.

translation.en: When?
[Kai] On Veldt, in Providence, the first time I heard your story.
translation.es: En Veldt, en Providence, la primera vez que escuché su historia.

translation.en: Thought with your ideals of resistance I could round up a couple of heads.
translation.es: Con sus ideales de resistencia, supe que podía reunir algunas cabezas.

translation.en: Tarak for instance.
His world enslaved.
Then there was Nemesis.
Her whole family slaughtered.
But General Titus?
Have you any idea how much he alone is worth?
translation.es: ¿Tienes idea de cuánto vale él solo?

translation.en: They would've all jumped at the chance
to exact any small vengeance against the Realm.
translation.es: vengarse del Reino de algún modo,

translation.en: Even if the payment was only a sack of grain.
translation.es: aunque el pago fuera solo un saco de granos.

translation.en: Then there was you. Kora.
Or should I call you Arthelais?
The biggest prize of them all.
Do you know what the Motherworld did to my planet?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué hizo el Mundo Madre en mi planeta?

translation.en: They didn't just destroy it.
They tortured every man, woman, and child.
translation.es: Torturó a cada hombre, mujer y niño.

translation.en: Left them clingin' to life as they turned them to ash from low orbit.
translation.es: Los dejó moribundos y los quemó vivos desde una órbita baja.

translation.en: You know what that taught me?
Never set foot on the wrong side of history.
translation.es: A nunca estar del lado incorrecto de la historia.

translation.en: [Kora] Is that what you think we're doing?
translation.es: ¿Eso es lo que crees que hacemos?

translation.en: [Kai] No.
You've chosen the side that doesn't even make it to the history books.
translation.es: Eligieron el lado que ni entra en los libros de historia.

translation.en: What happened to honor?
What did happen to it?
Piece of shit.
Well, who all have we got here?
Who indeed?
Commander Bloodaxe.
Leader of the very insurgency
the King's Gaze was sent to this backwater of the galaxy to capture.
translation.es: que la Mirada del Rey vino a detener en este rincón del universo.

translation.en: He alone will secure my seat in the Senate.
translation.es: Él solo ya asegurará mi puesto en el Senado.

translation.en: I would be remiss if I failed to mention we are in the presence of royalty.
translation.es: Sería un descuido no mencionar que estamos en presencia de la realeza.

translation.en: Or should I say Prince Tarak? [scoffs]
Needs no introduction, does he?
His actions at the Battle of Sarawu precede him.
translation.es: Lo preceden sus actos en la batalla de Sarawu.

translation.en: The farmer.
The ambitious farmer.
I pride myself on never being surprised.
translation.es: Me enorgullezco de nunca dejarme sorprender.

translation.en: And yet, here I am.
I understand why all of them are here… but you.
translation.es: Comprendo qué hacen aquí todos ellos… excepto tú.

translation.en: What could you have possibly hoped to gain by mounting such a… feeble stand?
translation.es: ¿Qué podías ganar tú al montar tan… endeble resistencia?

translation.en: Tell me.
Oh, yes.
The legendary swordswoman known only by the name of Nemesis.
translation.es: La legendaria espadachina conocida con el nombre de Némesis.

translation.en: Assassinated 16 high-ranking Imperial officers
translation.es: Asesinó a 16 oficiales imperiales de alto rango

translation.en: and their security details.
translation.es: y a su comitiva de seguridad.

translation.en: All in a hunt to avenge her slaughtered children.
translation.es: Todo en busca de venganza por sus hijos asesinados.

translation.en: [Noble] Of course.
Now I thought I recognized something in you,
translation.es: Me pareció reconocer algo en ti

translation.en: down in that filthy village.
Out there, amongst all those simple people,
the most wanted fugitive in the known universe.
translation.es: la fugitiva más buscada del universo conocido.

translation.en: Scargiver. Arthelais.
Do you know what you've done for me, Arthelais, truly?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo que has hecho por mí, Arthelais,

translation.en: Assembling yourself as such?
When I lay your bodies at the foot of the Regent,
translation.es: Al poner sus cuerpos a los pies del regente,

translation.en: I'll be a hero of the Realm.
They'll write songs of my feats of courage.
It's not like I didn't do all the work.
translation.es: Ni que yo hubiera hecho todo.

translation.en: Let's move this along, shall we?
Let's transport them paralyzed, in case anyone's feeling frisky.
translation.es: Los transportaremos paralizados, por si alguno se pone vivaracho.

translation.en: On your feet. I've got a job for you.
translation.es: De pie. Tengo una tarea para ti.

translation.en: Look… [grunts] Okay, okay.
You play your cards right, you at least might make it out of this alive.
translation.es: Si te portas bien, quizá al menos tú salgas vivo de esta.

translation.en: You're sick.
And you're a coward.
[Kai] All you have to do is pull the trigger.
[Gunnar] I won't do it.
[Kai] Yes, you will.
You can do it. Just pull the trigger.
translation.es: Tú puedes. Solo jala el gatillo.

translation.en: -I know you're in love with her. -[Gunnar sighs]
translation.es: Sé que estás enamorado de ella.

translation.en: [Kora whimpers] Gunnar.
I'm so sorry.
You can do it.
Pilots! To your ships!
[pilot] Cut me loose! We gotta go!
[screaming] No!
This is perfect.
They gave their lives for us.
They believed in their cause.
What better thing to die for?
And I should have died with them.
translation.es: Y yo debí morir con ellos.

translation.en: I know a thing or two about
the guilt of carrying on when those you've sworn to fight with are gone.
translation.es: sobre la culpa de seguir adelante cuando pierdes a tus compañeros de armas.

translation.en: Honor them.
With everything that you can from now.
translation.es: Con todo tu ser, desde ahora.

translation.en: Carry them.
This was a blow to the Motherworld, what we did this day.
translation.es: Esto que hicimos hoy fue un golpe al Mundo Madre.

translation.en: Criminals, nobodies, standing against a machine of war.
translation.es: Delincuentes, gente insignificante que venció a una máquina de guerra.

translation.en: This small act of defiance gives voice to the voiceless.
translation.es: Este ínfimo desafío da voz a los que no la tienen.

translation.en: This is more than just a fallen prick officer and some of his men.
translation.es: Es más que un cretino oficial caído junto a algunos de sus hombres.

translation.en: It's the beginning of something.
What will they do now?
The crews of the Imperium are not known for their bravery.
translation.es: Las tripulaciones del Imperio no son célebres por su valor.

translation.en: After the death of an admiral, protocol will demand the ship's return.
translation.es: Tras la muerte de un almirante, el protocolo exige regresar.

translation.en: That's good.
We still get paid, I presume?
[Kora] A deal is a deal.
Payment awaits us on Veldt.
translation.es: El pago nos espera en Veldt.

translation.en: I owe you thanks, Gunnar. You know, I never did trust that pilot.
translation.es: Te lo agradezco, Gunnar. Nunca confié en ese piloto.

translation.en: [Kora] We all owe him thanks.
He saved us.
[Titus] I've been wondering.
Is what that dead bounty hunter said true?
translation.es: ¿Es cierto lo que dijo el cazarrecompensas?

translation.en: That you're Arthelais?
Kai was a liar and a thief who nearly sold you all for a profit.
translation.es: Kai era un mentiroso y un ladrón que casi los vende a todos.

translation.en: Anything more you want, General?
Don't call me General.
Hey, you see it?
There.
That's our village.
Home.
[Kora] Home.
I never had a place to put to the word.
translation.es: Nunca tuve un lugar al que llamar así.

translation.en: It's almost a shame you killed that son-of-a-bitch Noble
translation.es: Es casi una pena que mataras al hijo de puta Noble,

translation.en: and we don't have to fight.
This would've been a beautiful place to die.
translation.es: Este habría sido un bello lugar donde morir.

translation.en: Yes, it would.
Let's go.
[technician 1] Ready him for transmission.
Balisarius is standing by.
[technician 2] Sir, should we stabilize him first?
[technician 1] No, we will not keep the Regent waiting.
translation.es: No, no haremos esperar al regente.

translation.en: Neurolink.
-[cable clicks] -[technician 2] Link is established.
[technician1] Connection complete.
Signal is strong.
[technician 1] Send him.
Master.
I have found her.
I have found Arthelais.
The Scargiver.
-You're certain it's her? -I am, my Lord.
She was in the company of the disgraced General Titus and Darrian Bloodaxe.
translation.es: Estaba junto al deshonrado general Titus y Darrian Bloodaxe.

translation.en: We are close to capturing them.
Tell me, Commander. Did you think that this would be good news?
translation.es: Dígame, comandante, ¿creyó que esta sería una buena noticia?

translation.en: That my daughter, Arthelais,
one of the most dangerous and decorated warriors
translation.es: una de las guerreras más premiadas y peligrosas

translation.en: in the history of armed conflict, is now part of a blossoming insurgency?
translation.es: en la historia del conflicto armado, sea parte de la incipiente insurgencia?

translation.en: I'm supposed to be happy
that she's joined forces with the genius battlefield commander, General Titus?
translation.es: que se haya unido al genial comandante de campo de batalla, el general Titus?

translation.en: Sir, she is within our grasp.
Let me bring you her head.
[Balisarius] In truth, I fear the head most endangered here is yours.
translation.es: Francamente, la cabeza que corre más peligro es la suya.

translation.en: You will crush this insurgency to the last man, do you hear me?
translation.es: Aplaste hasta al último miembro de esta insurgencia, ¿me oyó?

translation.en: And then you will capture my daughter alive
translation.es: Y luego capture a mi hija viva

translation.en: and bring back my precious child to me.
translation.es: y traiga a mi preciada niña ante mí.

translation.en: So that I may crucify her in the shadow of the Senate.
translation.es: Así la crucifico a la sombra del Senado.

translation.en: If you cannot bring her to me,
then the one whose public execution
will send shivers down the spines of the senators,
translation.es: que hará temblar a los senadores

translation.en: and whose screams will echo down its marbled halls
translation.es: y cuyos gritos retumbarán en los pasillos de mármol

translation.en: will be yours.
[technician 1] Did he make it back?
[technician 2] I don't know.
I have no heartbeat or brain function.
translation.es: No hay latido ni actividad cerebral.

translation.en: [technician 1] Hit him with everything.
